title: Book Review: 'The Expedition To The Boabab Tree'
teaser: Alan Cheuse reviews The Expedition to the Boabab Tree. Originally written in Afrikaans by Wilma Stockenstrom, the short novel on slavery has been translated by Nobel-winning writer J.M. Coetzee.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
